overview: I am an aspiring internet marketer. I adore music, movies & traveling. When I was young, I wanted to become a software programmer but when I reached a certain age, I shelved this dream for another one then shelved it again for another one. But no matter how inconsistent my dreams are, I’m glad that my passion for computers & internet has stood by me right from the start. That is why I love my job i.e Internet Marketing. Most of my inspirations come from my wanderings on the internet.
